A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Best Star Wars movie since The Empire Strikes Back - even with Canto Bite. Wonderful storytelling\, visually stunning\, great acting and chemistry\, perfect casting\, a bold star wars that is not made to please fans. One of those movies you can watch again and again and every time find a new perspective. And as always\, the fantastic music score of John Williams never disappoints.
